snippet.title: "Echo" Game Trailer Movie 2022
snippet.description:
"Echo" is a PC Action RPG with a well-rounded storyline.
Take down bosses using various skills and strategies.
The characters' progression style is affected by the strategies
obtained by the player. There are plenty of other game
elements that are sure to enrich gameplay such as lots
of puzzles, mini-games, and trophies. 

"Echoes of the heart" can be heard the moment each other's
paths intertwine.
The story begins with a young, solo adventurer named Lin.
Many secrets lie within the closed off forest she finds herself in.
Can you hear that faint voice? 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/751320
Discord：https://discord.gg/fvGkEExsBw
Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/Echo2010.ourvoice
Twitter: https://twitter.com/echo_ourvoice
itch.io: https://echo-project-tw.itch.io/echo-our-voice
